CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, September 8, 1956, pg. 3 reads: "What Gives? - Is probably the question in minds of first grade pupils at Crescent School, as they "eye" the Courier photographer who was present when they began the fall term of school, Tuesday. Their curiosity satisfied by an understanding teacher, the youngsters settled down later to their task of learning and playing together - the basic educational principle for assuring better American citizens. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: First graders seated at desks in classroom of Crescent School for the first day of class
